name: Sunsmoke
description:
For hundreds of years a dragon has called Mt. Thragas home, generally left alone by the region’s inhabitants and sometimes visited by an occasional Wizard of the Order seeking aid.  When the young Wizard Inoran comes in search of a solution to the errant magic plaguing the land, both the journey there and the encounter itself will prove challenging--and full of consequences.

Created for Writing For Games 2, Fall Semester 2020.
